titleStmt.title: A plain answer to a popish priest questioning the orders of the Church of England drawn up for the satisfaction of his parishioners, by a minister of that Church.
titleStmt.author: Seller, Abednego, 1646?-1705.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Abednego Seller. Cf. McAlpin Coll.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
